Class ProductOpinionCounter

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.uni_stuttgart.ims.compranking.rank.ProductOpinionCounter
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ProductOpinionCounterNumeric, ProductOpinionCounterPosNeg

    public abstract class ProductOpinionCounter
extends java.lang.Object
    Keep track of opinions about a product.
    Author:
    kesslewd

        protected java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> comments
        DEBUG/HACK List of products (keys) and interesting things/debug/analysis about each product (value). Fill this in 'getOverallOpinion' if you want it printed in 'writeRankingToFile'.
